objects.text:
• LED Display Shows Battery Level
• Transparent High-Tech Design
• Premium Sound Quality
• Touch Controls

product_details.name: Crystal Clear Transparent Wireless Earbuds with LED Display - Premium Sound & Style
product_details.description:
• Sleek transparent design showcasing high-tech internals with stunning LED blue lighting effects
• Digital LED display shows precise battery level and connection status
• Advanced touch controls for seamless music and call management
• Clear see-through charging case with modern aesthetic appeal
• Left/Right channel indicators for easy identification
• Ergonomic ear tip design for comfortable, secure fit
• High-quality stereo sound with deep bass response
• Wireless charging case with LED power indicator
• Bluetooth 5.0+ technology for stable connectivity
• IPX5 water-resistant protection for workout sessions
• Premium build quality with durable transparent materials
• Quick pairing technology for instant device connection

banner_details:
The banner features a sleek modern product advertisement with a futuristic tech theme, promoting wireless earbuds. The background consists of a two-tone diagonal gradient blend transitioning from a dark navy (#0E0B16) to vibrant purples (#4717F6 and #A239CA), lent depth with translucent glowing lines and dot clusters. 

Text layers include two bold, techno-styled top headings (`heading_1` and `heading_2`) in white, capturing immediate attention. A subheading (`subheading`) in vibrant magenta introduces the product, followed by a discount badge (`discount_badge` and `discount_text`). The description block (`description`) lists features clearly. The price section (`price`, `original_price`, and `strikethrough_line`) highlights a discounted offer. A CTA button (`cta_button` and `cta`) in bright purple enhances user engagement. The focal element is an embedded image of earbuds (`product_image`), strategically placed to draw visual interest.

**Color Palette**:
- Deep Black: #0E0B16
- Royal Purple: #4717F6
- Electric Violet: #A239CA
- Bright White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a modern, transparent wireless earbud case accented with a digital LED display and deep black earbuds. The color palette prominently includes Transparent Gray (#C0C0C0), Jet Black (#000000), Electric Violet (#6F00FF), and Cool LED White (#F4F4F4). The transparent casing allows the inner components and vibrant violet lighting to glow softly, blending technology with style. Vivid LED white elements highlight essential features like battery percentage, drawing attention without overpowering the overall design. The mix of cool and futuristic tones makes this palette ideal for a sleek, high-tech advertisement banner. Use gradient blends to maintain visual harmony.
